message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's a good deal!
Your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Consider, the money will be worth less if we wait!
I see you're eager to get a bigger share, but I'm not giving up! Considering the inflation, my new offer is 57-43. Take it before the money loses more value!
